CustomField.description: This field is used to display Batch Lot Number from associated Stocked Serial/Batch Lot/Installed Product.
CustomField.formula: IF( NOT( ISBLANK( SM_Stocked_Serial__c ) ) , SM_Stocked_Serial__r.SM_Batch_Lot2__r.Name , IF( NOT( ISBLANK( SM_Batch_Lot2__c ) ) , SM_Batch_Lot2__r.Name , IF( NOT( ISBLANK( SM_Installed_Product__c ) ) , SM_Installed_Product__r.SM_Batch_Lot2__r.Name , '') ) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field is used to display Batch Lot Number from associated Stocked Serial/Batch Lot/Installed Product.
CustomField.label: Batch/Lot Number
